page.title: 19 MITFORD ESTATE
page.content: Today,most of Mitford is given over to{intensive farming}on land owned by the{Mitford family,}who own most of the land in the area.Some fields are exchanged (by gentlemen's agreement) between some of the farmers,but the final decision is taken by the agent acting for the owners.The farms on the {Mitford Estate}are : Maiden's Hall _ Jack Gill;Newton Park _ Frank Renton; Newton Mill _ Jimmy Scott;Lightwater _ John Potts;Newton Underwood _ Peter Brewis;Dene House _ Billy Elliot; Spittal Hall _ William Brown;Mill Farm _ William Cuthbert;The Steads _ George and Jack Scott;East Coleside _ Dick Young;West Coleside _ Tommy Hunter.
